org.settings4j.connector.db.dao.hibernate
Class ConfigurationByteArray

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration
      org.settings4j.connector.db.dao.hibernate.ConfigurationByteArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ConfigurationByteArray
extends org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration

Extends the org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration ( Configuration) with one Methode to load a Hibernate Configuration-File from a ByteArray.

Author:
hbrabenetz

Method Detail

configure

public org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration configure(byte[] resourceContent,
                                                 java.lang.String resourceKey)
                                          throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
Use the mappings and properties specified in the given application resource. The format of the resource is defined in hibernate-configuration-3.0.dtd.

Parameters:
resourceContent - The Configuration Content
resourceKey - The name to use in warning/error messages
Returns:
A configuration configured via the byte[]
Throws:
org.hibernate.HibernateException
